documents.document: Wow! That was amazing, what a game, what a champion. So happy I was here to see it #teamfed #18 #ausopen
That's two 🙌🏻🇨🇭🎾 #teamfed #australianopen
That's one.... 🎾🇨🇭🙌🏻 #teamfed #australianopen
Hats on - game on! Come on Roger you've got this #teamfed #AusOpen #18 https://t.co/6UuGBD2cYc
@ruwanijourno yes, yes, yes! Ps I'll be here for you tomorrow night for Nadals match! 🤞🏻🎾#teamfed #ausopen
@ruwanijourno work takes a back seat if those two are in the final 😉#teamfed
@ruwanijourno see you Sunday night for an epic final 😉#teamfed #AusOpen
Thank you Roger - bring on the final 🤞🏻🎾 #teamfed #AustraliaDay https://t.co/JoU26FcUb6
@ruwanijourno actually can't believe it!! Thank you for sharing it with me 🙌🏻😘
@ruwanijourno slightly...... 😬
@ruwanijourno seriously not coping. Think I held my breath that entire set 😬
@ruwanijourno actually not coping https://t.co/WP2vx5Xl3Z
@ruwanijourno to early to call - currently a nervous wreck 🤞🏻😬 #teamfed #AusOpen
Sunday nights are so much better when I can watch @rogerfederer in blistering form 🎾👏🏻 #AusOpen #rogerfederer
Christmas Eve madness - why am I still shopping? 😵🎅🏻🎄
To my #nzsecretsanta my parcel is still at the depot - that's why there has been no excited tweets! 😎 #watchthisspace #christmasfun
@SammiALawrence what did you get this year? Mine is still on it's way! 🎄🙈
@SammiALawrence oh yay! 😍🍋can't wait to see what you get this year 🎄🤔
@nzsecretsanta thank you! Happy I didn't miss out this year 🎅🏻❤️
And to my new SS - hello! Sorry I only tweet about Roger Federer and like posts about Eddie Redmayne. Slightly obsessed with both of them 😂
Called off the bench to fill a @nzsecretsanta spot - yay! It'll be a quick sleuth and shop today 🎁🎅🏻
@nzsecretsanta thank you, that would be great - totally missed registrations this year?!! What was I thinking? 😳🙈
@nzsecretsanta yes please! 🙌🏻
@SammiALawrence @nzsecretsanta yay it's the gift that keeps on giving 🎁🎅🏻💓
I forgot to sign up for the @nzsecretsanta - what was I thinking? Hope my last years ss @SammiALawrence gets a lovely person this year!
Wise words Hillary 💕 https://t.co/fgB7vmezxV
@CNN key race alert music is so intense 😳 #USElection2016 #cnn #ElectionNight
Go and see 'Hell or High Water'. Chris Pine is brilliant and his eyes are distracting - in a very good way… https://t.co/GsIoblL2o0
Yo @TAB_Racing I can't put a bet on for the Melbourne cup?!! Boooooo! Won't accept my password? #MelbourneCup #tabnz
It's never a good sign when the taxi you are in stinks of disinfectant 😵 #taxitales #saturdaynightfrights
I feel like I need to tweet about 'Fantastic Beasts' just so I can use the Newt emoji #FBNewt #onemonthtogo #eddieredmayne
Totally a @BlocParty kind of Monday 🙌🏻 #blocparty #worklife
@MelissaStokes good call - I'll just remember how he was back in the day 😍
@MelissaStokes WOW! So how was he when he was playing 17 year old Dylan McKay? 25?? 😱
Is everyone watching spellbound? #spellbound #tv1 🐝
@danwootton when will I, will be famous...... so excited about this!
When google translate makes you LOL 😂 who is Bridget? #traveltales https://t.co/NgisDBOWHc
When your ride to the airport should take an hour but takes 20mins because the taxi driver goes 130ks the whole way 😵 #bangkok #holdontight
When the plane is empty and you get to lie down on your 14 hour flight! Boom ✈️👊🏻
So happy that Sterling K. Brown won - he was soooooo good in OJ. #SterlingKBrown #Emmys #Emmys2016
I really, really, really want @stanwawrinka to win the US open 🎾 #USOpen #StanTheMan
So the model NZ flag bearers are also pretty good at sailing #NZL #Olympics #burlingandtuke https://t.co/2Jy9qvPnsF
Day one ✔️ only a few more to go.... #RioOlympics2016 #olympicscoma #lovemyjob
Is that you @JRodgers11 competing in the beach volleyball at the Olympics? #doppleganger #busyweek #youaregold 😎 https://t.co/Xq4FHHVBr5
And my Olympics Auckland not Rio adventure begins....... #onajetplane #olympicscoma
@ruwanijourno @broodsmusic - such a great show 👍🏻
@gooodpr @danwootton @gpwhyte @paulajradcliffe if only I was a runner! Maybe that's my q - how do I become a runner?
@danwootton @broodsmusic the new album is amazing - see them if they ever come to London!! X
@broodsmusic killing it last night in Wellington - go and see them live if you ever get a chance #broods #nzmusic https://t.co/ePOZshuBBP
Why is lasagna always better night two? #riddlemethis
Pretty sad for @rogerfederer right now - was the perfect storm for him to win Wimbledon this year 😢 #teamfed #Wimbledon
A great feeling for Roger and his loyal fans! Bring on the semis #teamfed #Wimbledon https://t.co/bVfe0DPDo3
@SourceSyndicate amazing game! So hard to watch - but what a fighter #teamfed
Wow!!!! You are truely amazing Roger 🎾🍾 #teamfed #Wimbledon
We have a FIFTH!! My heart actually can't take this #teamfed #wimbledon
Tonight is a big night for Federer fans 🎾 #teamfed #Wimbledon https://t.co/VNw6d9UqLT
And that's how you beat Novak - great job Sam Querrey #Wimbledon #SamQuerrey
Say no to the rain! #Wimbledon #samquerrey
Actually I'm not sure my nerves could take watching this live #RogerFederer #Wimbledon
Wish I was at @Wimbledon right now 🎾🍓🇨🇭 #RogerFederer #Wimbledon
I just watched the All Blacks win, then I tired to understand the Auckland darts - now I'm watching Roger on grass. Hi Sport Saturday 🏉🎯🎾
@alexisclare1 brilliant! #facility
@brunny74 this is goooood news 👍🏻 https://t.co/1EGyGmIIVr
But I really liked Erin - she's all class #TheBachelorNZ #teamerin #kindoflikemynameminusthe'a'
I think Naz might win - he seems obsessed with her?! #TheBachelorNZ
This is exciting news - welcome #BravoNZ https://t.co/9hXYqCAF65
@TheSpinoffTV @JaneYee Steve and Gabs are flatmates! The Steve/season 1 connection is Invercargill - Alysha was from there & both teachers.
@SammiALawrence hey! Hope all is well and your having a good weekend 😘
When your letterbox looks like this when you arrive home #notideal https://t.co/8vd5hLpR49
Fun morning listening to 'The Theory of Everything' writer Anthony McCarten. A fab kiwi being great abroad! #nzfestival #eddieredmayne
Why do Auckland crowds feel the need to boo? #Hurricanes #blues
Wow Spotlight! Shocked it won but happy it did! #Oscars
No more sleeps! Let's do this 🍾 #Oscars
@ZDW_London So clever! Great work.
Two more sleeps till the #oscars and all the best picture nominations watched! Yay.
The awards season continues with the @BAFTA tomorrow - but why isn't @UKTV in New Zealand on sky playing them live like last year??
Shake it like a Polaroid picture - shessh that went on forever #eqnz
@brunny74 I love how he's dreaming of tennis and cups! 🎾🏆
This is why we love him! @brunny74 https://t.co/2LLG3nY9Xf
@WendyWings how could you not love him! He's sooooo British and cute!
@WendyWings he might be saving it for the Oscars! 😉
@MattyMcLean sadly he will - Leo will win. And believe me I'm a MASSIVE Eddie fan so it pains me to say it.
@rurude wow! That would have been amazing. Agassi forever ❤️ next year come to Melbourne 🎾 #funtimes #teamfed #retirementlooming
@rurude ha ha! Just that once! Thanks 🎾🍾 maybe one day we might watch tennis together? #AusOpen #anyopen #tennistweeters
@rurude I knew about Raffa but I thought you had a soft spot for #angryandy - so glad this isn't the case 👍🏻🎾 #ausopen
@rurude totally! Hard work being a Roger fan tonight. I'll be there tomorrow night as well - I'll cheer your boy Andy on #angryandy
@rurude that was a very tough watch. Something wasn't right. Thankfully he got a set 🙈 #noconsalation
@rurude totally! Even though I didn't think it was possible! 😍
@rurude so I'm in Melbourne which means I'm going to see Roger tomorrow. Excitement levels off the chart.
Leo's only Oscar competition - yes that's right people - Eddie Redmayne 🏆 #EddieRedmayne #oscar https://t.co/X8FBLLZfzE
@SallyannMoffat so good she's getting better. Such a sweet little thing 😸
@SallyannMoffat wow! A totally different kitty!!! You are the cat whisperer. Are you going to keep?!! 😻
@SallyannMoffat how's kitty? Still alive and getting better? 😻
@FlyAirNZ flight was cancelled from WGTN-AUK, rebooked a whole new flight tom morn as couldn't get through phone. Can I still get a refund?
@rurude yeah I haven't seen Jobs yet. It's on the list ✔️ Love there are only 8 best pics - more manageable to get through the list!
@rurude I know wow! Still think Brie will nudge in. Alicia might win supporting? Leo will win over my boy Eddie! Bring on the ceremony!
@danwootton yeah Leo will win this year, which I'm happy about. But 2 Oscars in consecutive years would be amazing for Eddie xx
@rurude ha ha! Ok good glad we are on the same page - sort of! I think Brie will win.... Watch this space! And it's always #fedforever
@rurude Jennifer Lawerence? Are we on different pages? 😂
@rurude it also depends if Alicia Vinkander is in Actress or supp - she may nudge JLau out if they decide she's leading not supporting.
